entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gros Morne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: WIND WARNING ENDED, Gros Morne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:01 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Berry Hill 12:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: 5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 4.3°C
Wind: SSE 12 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 12:56 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 12:56 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the evening then light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 12:56 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 12:56 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023
